experience.title: Head Swim Coach
experience.description: I spent this time coaching swimming, my previous career path, while I continued to learn Front End Development skills.
experience.technology: Learned Vue.js and honed my skills in Javascript by working through Free Code Camp and Code Academy courses.

projects.title: Mags for Miles
projects.technology: React, Redux, REST APIs, Gulp, Webpack, Pupeteer
projects.description: This homepage directs users to the direct mail and email campaigns for a program where users can use excess airline or hotel miles/points to subscribe to magazines. Choose a client to see the offer built on a separate React Application that manages the ecommerce logic for the magazine offers.

projects.title: Magazine Discount Center
projects.description: E-Commerce platform for purchasing individual magazines. Built on Angular frontend and Java backend.

projects.title: Bizrate Magazine Offer
projects.description: Private and gated offer to sell magazines at a low price for the first term of issues. Payments can be processed through an internal API using Credit Cards or Paypal, powered by the Braintree API. I personally have spent the majority of my 2 year career at Synapse helping build, optimize, and maintain this application. It is the most stable and profitable part of the Synapse business.

projects.title: Stopwatch
projects.description: Small personal project I made in 2016 to aid my swim coaching career.
